title: Coming Out
body:
Coming Out

A white light flashed and Evan appeared before the entrance portal of the Verdant Wilds Dungeon.

He looked at the portal of the dungeon for some time feeling puzzled about all the things that just happened.

After some time he took a deep breath and started to walk away from there.

There were many things going on into his mind, especially the way he just learned the language of elves.

All this time he was thinking that the scenes he saw during his advancement were just normal dreams.

But after what just happened he started to doubt whether they were just dreams or not.

He was extremely confused about why he remembered that scene from his dreams, and how he learned the language of elves just after remembering that scene.

Even though he is not very smart, he is not a complete idiot either. From the way things are happening with him, he knew there is definitely something wrong.
